shop.name: TravelGuard Insurance
shop.description: Comprehensive travel insurance plans for every journey

custom_attributes.description: List of coverage features and limits

products.name: Budget Explorer
products.description: Basic travel insurance coverage for budget-friendly trips. Covers emergency medical expenses, trip cancellation, and lost luggage with essential limits.

products.name: Essential Cover
products.short_description: Simple, affordable protection for short trips
products.description: Straightforward coverage designed for quick getaways. Includes medical emergencies and basic trip protection at an affordable price.

products.name: Standard Voyager
products.short_description: Comprehensive worldwide coverage for confident travelers
products.description: Our most popular plan with worldwide coverage, generous medical limits, and comprehensive trip protection. Ideal for international vacations.

products.name: Premium Shield
products.short_description: Maximum protection with premium benefits and concierge service
products.description: Our highest tier of coverage with unlimited medical benefits, generous trip protection, and premium concierge service. For travelers who want the best.
